SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0f2baf3acb514432a3ba743f619e4766" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You'll be pleased to learn that I installed a
few new apps onto your Tablet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0f2baf3acb514432a3ba743f619e4766" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I'm sure you'll find them more than useful
when you're out in the field,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so check them
out when you have a spare minute.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0f2baf3acb514432a3ba743f619e4766" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Now that we have that sorted out,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are you
ready to get out there and explore?
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_Recommend_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3a663322267a412b841f3d726015bc5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The captain's quite excited to talk to you
about [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s growth spurt.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You should
go see what she has to say.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3a663322267a412b841f3d726015bc5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]And [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] had something to discuss with
you as well.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3a663322267a412b841f3d726015bc5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]Feel free to put off your departure until
after you have a chance to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]speak with
them both[System:Color name="Default"].
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_Area002_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="462d5edbf4674fcfae53f6babb127fba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm picking up some signals that may be
coming from other castaways in the most
recently discovered area.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="462d5edbf4674fcfae53f6babb127fba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]There could be a stranded Rescue Officer
out there...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We're counting on you to
rescue them.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Preferably very soon.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_Area003_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="34615ce6fe9c40929a5fc040bc63dbf2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hmm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's interesting.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm detecting
even more signals in that recently
discovered area.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="34615ce6fe9c40929a5fc040bc63dbf2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That may be where [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and our
missing Rescue Officers are.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_Area010_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e0d3ecead0bd4bb8b1947091d207452d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Now that the Rescue Corps is properly
reassembled,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we can finally put our minds
and efforts toward our main mission.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e0d3ecead0bd4bb8b1947091d207452d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Despite the delays,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm confident our
search for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will be
nothing if not successful!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_Area004_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1c456e74bfc94c37b890c7fb49b722a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]We've picked up a signal from the new
area.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's most likely coming from that
Koppaite veterinarian, [etc:Wait frame="8"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1c456e74bfc94c37b890c7fb49b722a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let's get her back here quickly so she can
give [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] a full examination.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_Area006_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="58ceb629ae8c4458a0615cb649e2c301" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I took a closer look at that SOS signal
and saw that the rest of the castaways
are located in the area we just uncovered.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="58ceb629ae8c4458a0615cb649e2c301" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] the veterinarian should be among
them...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We're getting close!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f3b535b0c89743e887a96a4fe11019e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We're all set over here![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The S.S. Beagle
can take off whenever you're ready.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="40441084063440509a53d7279e022e16" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you're not sure what you need to do
next,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can always check your missions
for some ideas.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9eddc495056e48779a238db87eb26b63" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I look forward to the day when the Rescue
Corps is reunited and we can finally focus
on rescuing [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="dae0e74bca4a487fa99a678286872d1a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]All systems are go![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The S.S. Beagle is
ready for takeoff!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="4c02a547874b4ea4832a10ac2133cf68" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We'll need some kind of medicine to cure
the leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thankfully, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is
experienced with these sorts of things.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A07_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="17376d8f236d4c2cb0d39228a676f5ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]We can do this![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's collect more treasure
and get the S.S. Shepherd fully charged.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A07_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="fdf8b52f6a6942e0bd33753c988cde1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The S.S. Beagle is prepared for launch.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
All we need now is a destination.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="343266bacb6b485288f7ead0eac539d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Do you know where you're going next?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
OK![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Time to rescue [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="aca3dc6c492e42f19119462a05bcd5e1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The S.S. Beagle is prepared for launch.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
All we need now is a destination.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6d979d2ec0a24488ac1505233b1d7a2e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]They don't call us the Rescue Corps for
nothing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll find a way to rescue
everyone and make it home together!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f1be7104eb734b2e8897bd7b7dc10066" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I hope we rescue that veterinarian, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],
soon.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm starting to get antsy...
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A04_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ce26e74c56f9447f940e462247f66ee3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We're going to cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and return
home together.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know we will!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9f3ce8d311254e7d973955acf900213b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The S.S. Beagle is prepped and ready.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Here's hoping we find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] soon.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9ca8ba0d0ae749d19581048e794eb06c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]We need to find that giant dog...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is
counting on us.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A05_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f4cb3cee50de4b93b8366198e5c195f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So there's a giant dog several times bigger
than [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I wonder if [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] could
really handle something like that.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A06_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a55590bbe8b340aaabc47625ee91e7f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Be sure to investigate thoroughly now![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Life's too short for regrets.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A06_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="8048c3d7090648a8a72c50f12eea17dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If you really want to thoroughly explore
an area,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I recommend using the Treasure
Gauge...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s nose!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_A06_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="4f6abfbbfa6c44398759117f32b75494" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Whenever you consider your mission
complete and want to go home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just talk
to our pilot, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_B01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ab1e21f73b38499aa2c1621544ae942b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I believe [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is going to give us
something of a primer about the
Lumiknoll!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_B03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="683fa942f6c545288c2f30e2c415e00e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Glow sap is the key medicinal element
needed to create a cure for the leaflings.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="683fa942f6c545288c2f30e2c415e00e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Just talk to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], and he'll get you all
set up for a night expedition!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_B04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1b05830ef79643559093e06840878a31" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Another Dandori Battle with that
leafling, huh?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1b05830ef79643559093e06840878a31" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I believe you can win it this time!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_B05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7f5da736b61f48e2a48eba5141c34d8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I think winning a Dandori Battle is all about
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s carrying power and the number of
Pikmin at your disposal.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7f5da736b61f48e2a48eba5141c34d8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Remember that, and you're sure
to win, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_B06_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="86ed0c3f20074c29a2e0701a2c9c3542" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Distracting or sabotaging your opponent
to prevent them from getting points is a
totally valid strategy in Dandori Battles.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="86ed0c3f20074c29a2e0701a2c9c3542" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Just saying.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Now, good luck out there,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You got this!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_B07_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e66f096848144f79a6c9f1983300cec0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Come on![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We need to hurry up and
rescue [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] She's waiting for us
in the Primordial Thicket.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_B08_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b812040e56064b699e507a49e719f1ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If we can track [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s scent,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we'll be that
much closer to finding that giant dog.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b812040e56064b699e507a49e719f1ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Give [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] a chance to sniff around a bit
once you're in the Primordial Thicket.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_B09_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6fdf661c00af4f01a3f1850b805e8c45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If we're going to save [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we need
to get a cell sample from that giant dog
as soon as possible.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6fdf661c00af4f01a3f1850b805e8c45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]All our hopes lie with you now,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Good luck.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Intro_B10_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="eb7f6d7d99fc417ab6212c9348d4a7e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]We can't forget about the leaflings now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
They're castaways too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just like we were.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bf90ef803cf74894a83cda0b3aabae38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I'm just so relieved that you got my
SOS signal in time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bf90ef803cf74894a83cda0b3aabae38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I was in a panic as I tried to escape the
spaceship.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If that signal didn't work...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I shudder to even think about it!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1d430f22c3df4b4aa63c29779e4adbb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When it comes to rescuing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you'd be lost
without your [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Tablet[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Press [PictureFont:IconData key="STAB" scale="0.66"/] to open it up
and access lots of helpful information.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d430f22c3df4b4aa63c29779e4adbb7" Scale="1"/]You can check the Radar Map when you're
actually lost or look at the Missions tab to
review your immediate objectives.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d430f22c3df4b4aa63c29779e4adbb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]And that's just the tip of the iceberg![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It has a lot more features to check out.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ba5074bd949543b099b52502d86cedc7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Are Pikmin plants, or are they animals?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
What do you think about it?
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="cb543873413b4ec6b627529e4caa558c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I had no idea that anyone else had
received [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s SOS signal
and decided to come to this planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cb543873413b4ec6b627529e4caa558c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]But it doesn't matter who's stranded or
why.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's our job to get them home safe.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="773099a3e7804cc1a1370a181551b5ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I bet the stuff that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] cooks up in
the Lab is really useful to have when
you're out exploring in the field.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="773099a3e7804cc1a1370a181551b5ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Just keep those raw materials coming,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and he'll keep developing all kinds of gear.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bdb3e89e0d134b50a4ee918e6560dcdd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The captain has a special certification in
Rescue Pup training.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bdb3e89e0d134b50a4ee918e6560dcdd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]She's also one of the few members of the
Rescue Corps with the highest certificate
ranking.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I mean, she's kind of...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]incredible.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="edebf3d4133f4dcd82d2dcfc66228dab" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You never know what you'll learn when you
peruse your Tablet or talk to someone
new around here.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="77869460d28041b2bf9ec3a0ed599ff1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Apparently we'll need a special substance
collected from [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lumiknolls [System:Color name="Default"]to make a
medicine that can cure the leaflings.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="77869460d28041b2bf9ec3a0ed599ff1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You can only encounter Lumiknolls during
night expeditions,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I suggest you talk
to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to hear more about it.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a22aee0974a948d08285ce47b835b92e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Believe it or not,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can always count
on [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you're ever in a tough spot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
he'll show up to save you...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]probably.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="56eeb38669714f7b9683e0e1c4ec69d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] may be a laid-back kind of guy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but he's incredibly accomplished in the
medical field.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="abb4049ffa8941ac8c21cc591bcd3a43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Once you become a leafling,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it seems like
the only thing you think about is the art
of Dandori.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="abb4049ffa8941ac8c21cc591bcd3a43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Maybe they're being controlled to think
and to act that way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perhaps against
their will!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9c10fbeb8cc843cfb365248f37ad801c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I hope we're able to rescue [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
soon.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] His family must be so worried...
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="89757549c9d84afd8d05844b7fb47d9a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]He may not act the part,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
is actually a veteran pilot.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="89757549c9d84afd8d05844b7fb47d9a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I heard that at the intergalactic travel
company where he used to work,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he piloted
a 20,000-hour-long flight.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]long.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6871132f61df458b9548768cebce5bca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I really hope we're able to take [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
home with us.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I get choked up at the
thought of leaving him behind.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6871132f61df458b9548768cebce5bca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] saved my life.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It feels like it's
my responsibility to help save his!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1e746d14156f45178b8774cd49da1706" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]There are 43 individuals on this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
not counting [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1e746d14156f45178b8774cd49da1706" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]That's...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]a lot. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]I just hope we can rescue
them all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sure that we can!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_05_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0eceabb90c794766994683e1fdfa327f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I was surprised to learn that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is
quite reticent in person,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] weren't you?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0eceabb90c794766994683e1fdfa327f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Though I must admit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he does have a
certain air of gravitas about him.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="8f02ded7c65848cbb6c4c43c9c32f943" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I heard that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] became a treasure
hunter so he could help solve the poverty
crisis back on his home planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8f02ded7c65848cbb6c4c43c9c32f943" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]What a generous and noble pursuit![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I never expected someone so intimidating
to be so kind.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="085508d5757a4b05928e0d07434d1be9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]From what I can tell,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] really looks
up to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="085508d5757a4b05928e0d07434d1be9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Somehow he always finds a way to bring
him up in conversation.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="dff30cf0ff7b4e269a4520213a6c86d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Giyans,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ohrians,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hocotatians,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and Koppaites...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dff30cf0ff7b4e269a4520213a6c86d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]How funny that there are so many planets
represented here on this tiny, little
nondescript ball of dirt floating in space.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_07_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ce5d28132e684a93849a2db16b984dcf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]So what exactly is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s end game here?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I don't really get it...
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_07_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="cb2a03ca102347feb548d55c66fb13e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] comes across as quite aloof,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
doesn't she?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cb2a03ca102347feb548d55c66fb13e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]She doesn't seem to pal around much with
her crew either.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You know what?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can
respect a healthy work-life balance.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_07_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b631e5a0846840039d626ce810ba167c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Koppaites are notoriously poor planners,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but you can only judge something like that
on an individual basis.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b631e5a0846840039d626ce810ba167c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for example,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is pretty laid-back,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
while [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] tends to plan ahead.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b631e5a0846840039d626ce810ba167c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] on the other hand,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can be...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]pretty
intense.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Especially when the topic turns
to food.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="475ae1d9efe046d68ae564b7cdcf4e5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I recently asked [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] about her
experiences with that giant dog
creature.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="475ae1d9efe046d68ae564b7cdcf4e5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Apparently, when she was first captured,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it was quite playful.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She said she didn't
feel like she was in any danger at all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="475ae1d9efe046d68ae564b7cdcf4e5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]That made me wonder if it was acting
more aggressive and violent because it
was being controlled by [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="29848c5ef4414f028e5aa004fb7eef91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There must be something about this
planet that pulls ships in or causes
machinery to malfunction.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="29848c5ef4414f028e5aa004fb7eef91" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]But wait.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Come to think of it...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]why didn't
your ship crash, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="626ab2a42d6d416b9c2bdfa7654bfc98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If you press [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_Y_Button" scale="0.66"/] while on the Area Select
screen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can see your current progress
for every surface area and every cave.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="626ab2a42d6d416b9c2bdfa7654bfc98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Be sure to keep an eye on your Status
Reports when out in the field!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="89b153478ee54e76a07707c17ab607d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The captain has a special certification in
Rescue Pup training.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="89b153478ee54e76a07707c17ab607d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]She's also one of the few members of the
Rescue Corps with the highest certificate
ranking.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I mean, she's kind of...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]incredible.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f25aae529d6542728d27888dfe1dea77" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Believe it or not,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can always count
on [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you're ever in a tough spot,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
he'll show up to save you...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]probably.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6de15092580244f9a3b2c71c97d4d6b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] may be a laid-back kind of guy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but he's incredibly accomplished in the
medical field.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d6b29eaee170408aa72bbca2ab3687cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]He may not act the part,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
is actually a veteran pilot.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d6b29eaee170408aa72bbca2ab3687cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I heard that at the intergalactic travel
company where he used to work,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he piloted
a 20,000-hour-long flight.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]long.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c4158a10eb4d47318f75bee185403207" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I was surprised to learn that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is
quite reticent in person,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] weren't you?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c4158a10eb4d47318f75bee185403207" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Though I must admit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he does have a
certain air of gravitas about him.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="def09dcd137c42fa879053ddcc63f754" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I heard that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] became a treasure
hunter so he could help solve the poverty
crisis back on his home planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="def09dcd137c42fa879053ddcc63f754" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]What a generous and noble pursuit![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I never expected someone so intimidating
to be so kind.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="06ea2c2078f8451aae2196c5d3c97d84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]From what I can tell,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] really looks
up to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="06ea2c2078f8451aae2196c5d3c97d84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Somehow he always finds a way to bring
him up in conversation.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="077a730671f44ca08a13bb62c545eb5b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Giyans,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ohrians,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hocotatians,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and Koppaites...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="077a730671f44ca08a13bb62c545eb5b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]How funny that there are so many planets
represented here on this tiny, little
nondescript ball of dirt floating in space.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f1d59ef08e3a4a3baf5b3a2fda2d90ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] comes across as quite aloof,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
doesn't she?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f1d59ef08e3a4a3baf5b3a2fda2d90ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]She doesn't seem to pal around much with
her crew either.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You know what?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can
respect a healthy work-life balance.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="fd7793fd1e99471a97c0a160ac7894d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Koppaites are notoriously poor planners,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but you can only judge something like that
on an individual basis.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fd7793fd1e99471a97c0a160ac7894d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Dobbs,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for example,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is pretty laid-back,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
while Yorke tends to plan ahead.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fd7793fd1e99471a97c0a160ac7894d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Nelle,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] on the other hand,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can be...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]pretty
intense.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Especially when the topic turns
to food.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Hint_08_14:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="68ba7cb78bb54dec9d8d38a8b448718b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You never know what you'll learn when you
peruse your Tablet or talk to someone
new around here.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Continue_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f222a4e2e4f14258b9db585f855c075e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Ready for action?
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Continue_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1cd30dc6f53648ae945d876130ae76e1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let me know when you're ready to explore.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'll be right here waiting for you!
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="435276f362b34a978e14fbdbf96de566" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hey there, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What's new?
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="32c15df222a14bd3b8f775caca78df35" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hey, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], my little pup buddy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Getting
along with [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] OK?
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="61f827bd08db4d42911b78554d9f111a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Which area would you like to explore?
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5fe1dfa5526c4ac79a2c967e0b567f23" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Whenever you're ready,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm ready![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
So come find me.
SV000.SV000_Area500_Talk_Outro_B01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="421219576e3f45c3aa8a596a99c4a8a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If you ever feel stuck,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] try talking to the
captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She always knows what to do.
